name: Rorys Restaurant: Winter Rush
description:
Follow Rory's story as she visits her hometown after her first successful restaurant business! Rory's Restaurant Winter Rush features an amazing mix of Match3 game plus Cooking! This game has every genre you love and are already familiar with: Match3 and Hidden Object!

- 70 Challenging Match-3 levels
- Fun Hidden Object minigames
- Learn 18 new Recipes
- Learn Culinary Fun Facts as you play
